p: The product specification for the distilled fraction is based on the concentrations (expressed as % of GC area) of the main components, namely d‐limonene (66–78%, the phytochemical marker), pin‐2(10)‐ene (5–20%), α‐terpinene (1.5–9.5%), pin‐2(3)‐ene (0.5–3.0%) and or sabinene (0.5–3.0%). Analysis of five batches of the additive 11 showed compliance with these specifications (Table 16). These five compounds account for about 90.7% on average (range 85.0–92.9%) of the product, expressed as area % of GC area.
